content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the chair in this query description: "the object is a chair. it is on the right side of the room from the doorway at the end table. it is the second one next to the wall.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

In view 4, the layout of the room is visible from a perspective that shows the right side of the room clearly. The chairs and tables are visible, and the second chair next to the wall can be identified more clearly than in other views.

Here is the annotated image of the selected view. 
All objects belonging to the chair class is labeled by a unique number (ID) in red color on it.
Please select the object ID that best matches the given query description: "the object is a chair. it is on the right side of the room from the doorway at the end table. it is the second one next to the wall.".
Carefully analyze the specified conditions (such as shape, color, relative position with surrounding objects) in the given query, then select top-5 best-matched object IDs.
The selected top-5 object IDs should be sorted in descending order of confidence.
The object ID should be chosen from this list [0, 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 16, 18, 19, 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 30]
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys:

"object_id": A list of5 selected target object IDs. e.g., [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

The query describes a chair on the right side of the room from the doorway, next to an end table, and the second one next to the wall. Analyzing the image, the right side from the doorway is towards the IDs 5, 6, 10, 24, 25, and 26. The chairs 25 and 26 are next to the wall, with 26 being the second one next to the wall. Therefore, 26 is the best match. The next best matches are 25, 24, 10, and 5, as they are also on the right side and near the wall.
